des: "I have made this from scratch for years and my kids used to love it and I still make it just for myself.  I use two cups or more of home canned tomatoes."
ins:
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
In a large saucepan combine cooked macaroni, milk, margarine and salt and pepper.  Then stir in tomatoes.  Cook over medium heat until quite hot.
